titleStmt.title: The resolver, or, A short vvord, to the large question of the times. Concerning the Parliament: and confirming the proceedings about the King. Being, a letter written to a deare friend, tending to satisfie him. At least, to shew the authour rationall, in approving the proceedings of the Army. / Imprimatur Gilbert Mabbot.
titleStmt.author: N. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.C. and are to be sold at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
